meanings.sent1: The clown's pottiest hat made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent2: She wore the pottiest outfit to the party.
meanings.sent3: The pottiest squirrel tried to juggle acorns.
meanings.sent4: His pottiest idea was to wear socks on his hands.

meanings.definition: The silliest or most foolish person or thing
meanings.sent1: The class clown was known as the pottiest student.
meanings.sent2: The pottiest in the group always made everyone smile.
meanings.sent3: The pottiest in the office tried to balance a pencil on their nose.
meanings.sent4: She felt like the pottiest in the room with her mismatched shoes.
meanings.sent5: The pottiest of all the animals in the zoo was the playful monkey.
